name: TicToc Pic: Zombie or Vampire Reflex Test Game
name_original: TicToc Pic: Zombie or Vampire Reflex Test Game
description:
In a split second, can you decide if the image is a Zombie or a Vampire? Play the most addictive reflex game in the app store! Test your reflexes, hit high scores, and climb the leaderboard!!

Key Features:
- Hours of gameplay (if you have amazing reflexes!)
- Dozens of fantastic images
- Gamecenter Leaderboards & Achievements
- Hit high scores and challenge your friends!
